name: Theros
description: The centre of administrative power in the kingdom, Theros is home to the King's throne and the endless debating of his councillors.

name: Anrios
description: The City of Winter, Anrios is the seat of the Guild of Warriors and the quality of its mines are famous across the continent.

name: Vokar
description: Vokar is host to the grandest market in the kingdom; if it cannot be bought in Vokar, it cannot be bought at all.

name: Lanitir
description: Sunset city, Lanitir hosts the Guild of Magi, a place where skies of pink and red are filled with the solemn chanting of arcane rites.

name: Xalin
description: In the shade of bent boughs and tall oaks, Xalin may not have the grandeur of the other cities, but it alone possesses that ineffable blend of potential and power.

name: Temple ruins
description: Ruins of an old temple, abandoned eaons ago
